lead_paragraph: Researchers identified the strain by analyzing DNA patterns that can be compared with those from other regions of the world.

headline.main: Cholera in Haiti Matches Strains Seen in South Asia, U.S. Says
headline.seo: Haiti Cholera Said to Match South Asia Strains
